{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and aspirations, is priced at $999,999. I believe this offer presents an exceptional chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a highly competitive price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 999999}
